title: Hong Kong woman loses HK$180,000 in K-pop star G-Dragon concert ticket scam
summary: Scammers have conned a woman out of HK$180,000 (US$23,077) over tickets for Korean singer G-Dragon’s coming sell-out concerts in Hong Kong, one of nearly 30 victims cheated out of more than HK$610,000 for the three shows. Hong Kong police on Monday urged the public to exercise caution when buying ti
fullContent: Scammers have conned a woman out of HK$180,000 (US$23,077) over tickets for Korean singer G-Dragon’s coming sell-out concerts in Hong Kong, one of nearly 30 victims cheated out of more than HK$610,000 for the three shows. Hong Kong police on Monday urged the public to exercise caution when buying tickets to events after receiving more than 200 reports over related swindles since mid-July, accounting for 40 per cent of all online shopping scam cases. Almost 30 cases involved G-Dragon concert...
